Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to deliver exceptional value and performance. With its unique features and high-quality materials, this product stands out in its category. We believe it's worth more than $150 to you, considering the benefits it will bring to your needs. For a limited time, I'm offering you the opportunity to own this product at an exclusive price of $200. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the superior quality firsthand. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in enhancing your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
